title: Warm chickpea salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '75g diced red onion', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint']
